document_data.name: Bakkal's Creek
document_data.mainbody: '''Bakkal's Creek''' was a tributary of the [[River of Ice]] in [[Calimshan]].
document_data.Geography: This icy-cold stream flowed calmly from the foothills of the [[Marching Mountains]] until it joined with [[Two Falls River]] from the west at the [[Cold Eyes]] to form the River of Ice.
document_data.History: Until the [[Third Age of Calimshan]], a temple once stood on the banks of this creek, dedicated to a dark god whose name is now lost to history. The [[bakkal]]s, the ancient theocratic rulers of the nation of [[Coramshan]] and of [[First Age of Calimshan|Calimshan's First]] and [[Second Age of Calimshan|Second Ages]], used to ceremonially bathe in the stream after performing symbolic rituals at the temple as part of their coronations. The temple was destroyed by [[beholder]]s during the [[Orb Marches]].
